1.content: It was a sunny day in Summer, when the world changed forever.That was the day that the people of the world shrunk.Only those under the age of 13 remained normal sized.Who's POV do you take?
1.title: Rise of the giant kids

1141.content: Sophocles is a four year old boy who lives with his parents as well as his older brother, Jonathan. Sophocles was a pretty chubby nerd who would always get teased by his older brother. What really made this worse was the fact that he and Jonathan had to share a room. One summer day however, that all changed when he woke up one day to find his brother's shrunken form on his pillow. "S-Sophocles!? How did you get so big!?" Jonathan yelled as he looked up at his brother. Sophocles giggled and shrugged. "I don't know. Though, something tells me that this is where I pay you back for all the pain you caused me." He said picking up his "little brother". Jonathan yelled as he was picked up. "No Sophocles! Please! I'm sorry!" He yelled. Sophocles giggled and grabbed the waistband of his underwear. "Oh don't worry. By the time I'm done, you WILL be sorry you ever messed with me." He said. As he held Jonathan up, Sophocles was debating between putting him in the front or back of his underwear.
1141.title: Sophocles

11411.content:
Sophocles put Jonathan down the front of his underwear. Because there wasn't much room, he slipped down with his front sliding down the fabric, and his back scraping down Sphoclese's penis. On account of the smell, Jonathan immediately started struggling to get out!

Sophocles loved this as he continued on...
11411.title: Front

121.content: Should he start at giant size or grow to giant size?

122.content: Should he already be a giant or eventually start growing to giant size

123.content:
A cute 8-year-old boy with blonde hair and green eyes now stood, in his simple t-shirt and shorts, the tallest human in the house. At his giant bare feet, his parents tried to talk with him,

"Son! We don't know what's happened, please, just, calm down, and--" They thought he was terrified about his parents' new diminutive stature, but...he actually enjoyed it very much.

The boy stood blankly for a bit, then, looked down at his tiny parents with a teasing, devilish smile. His stomach growled.

"Time for breakfast!" He shouted. "I wonder what parents taste like..."
123.title: 8 year old giant

choices: Go outside and find more tinies maybe?
Stay in and do whatever; the house is yours!
1231.content:
"I'm sooooo hungry!!" The boy shouted as his stomach produced deafening moans of emptiness. Quickly, he snatches his mom and dad up, and brings them to his face. They can feel his warm breath breeze past, and are absolutely petrified.

"Bye-bye!" The boy giggled as he threw his parents into his mouth and swallowed them whole, feeling their descent down his throat and their plop into his stomach.

"Ahhh, that's better..." His stomach was content with the meal, immediately starting to digest the unlucky two. Screams of pain and begging could be heard, but only for a bit, as they continually lost a battle with the boy's rumbling tummy.

At this moment, the boy thirstily gulped down a cup of milk, dribbles of it sliding down his face. It made him burp really loudly, the stench of stomach acid and sweet cow juice filling the air. He burped twice more, as he decided on what to do next...
1231.title: He eats them both

12311.content: The boy had realized how good it feels to eat those tiny humans, especially those who were mean to him. Speaking of which, he started heading to the playground near his house while devouring anyone who was on the street. When he finally got the the playground, he found that "big" bully and his gang who had been picking on ther kids for a while. He swiftly got ahold of them while hearing them begging for their lives. The more they begged, the hungrier the boy got. Soon he threw them all in his mouth then quickly swollowed them whole. The boy had never felt this happy in a while, those savage kids couldn't hurt anyone anymore now that they're in his stomach. After a few burps, he wenr home and drifted off to sleep
12311.title: Go outside and find more tinies maybe?

choices: That it was all a dream
123111.content: After sleeping and having those bully digested, the boy woke up hours later. He turned on hiz tiny TV and realized that the cops were looking for the group of kids that got eaten by him, "Oh boy! Kids sure do taste better than adults" said they boy while rubbing his chubbier belly. "Mom! I'm sooooo hungry!" Then he realized that his mom couldn't make him dinner anymore since he ate her. The best place for dinner would be at the mall. He runned to the mall while causing mini earthquakes to the neighbourhood near him. When he got to the mall, he thought that it must be his lucky day since there's also a carnival with lots of families all staring at him. His stomach growled amd rhe boy couldn't hold it anymore. "Bon appetit!" Said the boy before he literally digged in the crowd of families. He started eating families after families. Soon there was no one left at the carnival, then the boy proceed to the mall, he rolled up the rooftop of the building, and people inside were just like sardines in a can. "Nice! Now off to the main course!" People started panicking and running all over the mall, but it was no use since their tiny legs were moving too slow to the boy. The giant boy would be eating a few people at a time with one hand, while grabbing the food from the food court with his other hand. It wasn't long until the cops showed up, however theit bullets would prove useless to the boy's thick skin. And so, the cops had become his dissert, hey could shoort all they wanted but in tge end they all ended up in the boy's now packed stomach content with his fancy dinner at the mall. After the boy was all finished, he felt extremely sleepy since his stomach is trying its best to digest all the people in there. The boy sat by the mall while drinking out of the water tank of the building and rubbing his huge stuffed belly. Suddently there was a rumble coming from his belly. It was not long before the boy released a huge 5 seconds long burp. Making the whole area smelled like flesh and mixed food. The boy couldn't remember the last time he was this full and satisifed. While still rubbing and slapping his overstuffed belly, he drifted off to a deep slumber. He woke up hours later and found out..
123111.title: Dinner time?

choices: He goes out and eats more tinies
He sleeps and wakes up starving
1233.content:
As soon as the parents heard that, they bolted away from their son. However, at their size, they didn't get very far, and he picked them up.

"Ha ha! I caught you!" He drops them into his mouth.

The parents, helpless against their son, were rolled around by his tongue and slathered in saliva. His warm breath made the air unbearably thick and hot. After a bit of that, he effortlessly gulped them down, one after the other.

"Ahh..." The boy sighed as he felt the two lumps go down his throat, and land softly in his stomach. He lifted up his t-shirt and patted his bare, gurgling belly.

The parents were quickly digested by the boy's stomach acids. Still hungry, he quickly covered them in the mush of three bowls of cereal and an ocean of milk. His tummy now was noticeably bloated, and obnoxiously gurgling. The boy put his hand over his deep innie belly button, feeling the satisfied rumbling of his stomach. A pressure started to rise up from his stuffed tummy, culminating in a huge, 5-second long, deep belch. The boy enjoyed its sweet cereal smell, forgetting that he had ever eaten his parents.

He lied down on the couch, putting his big feet up and patting his soft, full belly. He let out another lengthy, gigantic burp, as his breakfast digested.
1233.title: The parents RUN!!

124.content:
A tall 9-year-old boy with wavy brown hair and blue eyes stood, impossibly tall to the eyes of his parents, sitting at his feet, about a mere inch tall. His giant bare toes were bigger than them.

"Hee hee," He mocked, "Look who's so tiny!" The boy lifted his foot and lightly kicked his parents, sending them sliding across the floor.

Suddenly...

choices: eat all the food in the house
1242.content:
As the parents recover from their slide across the floor, the boy's stomach emits a loud, empty growl. He rubs his belly, with a mischievous smile across his face.

"I know what can fill my tummy..." The boy says, picking up his parents into his gigantic hand. They are absolutely terrified, staring at the vast surface of their son's face.

"Please...don't eat us!!" Thr father finally pleads.

"Ha ha ha!" The boy laughs at his dad'd begging, "Like you'd ever listen to me if I begged like that to stay up late, or keep playing video games, or..." The boy was getting excited. He finally had the power to end his parents' reign over him!

He opened his giant maw, and dropped his parents inside. He swished them around, coating them in gooey saliva.

"Mmm...you taste good." The boy says, "My stomach will like you..."

With one powerful gulp, the boy sends his parents down to his stomach. He pats it as it moans, while they drop in.

Inside his stomach, it is hot, humid, smelly, and empty...well, there is a small piece of resilient fast food meal from yesterday, but other than that, the parents are alone in a cauldron of undulating gurgles.

Panicking, the father and mother both start pounding on the stomach walls. This pleases the boy.

"Ahh...that feels nice." The boy takes off his shirt, revealing his flat, bare belly, a big innie belly button dotting the rounded lower area. For a nine-year-old boy, his height made his stomach look like he could eat a whole city before gaining any weight.

After a while, the boy's parents are digested, nothing but mush in his happy, rumbling tummy. Suddenly, air trapped inside his stomach builds up an immense pressure. The boy pounds his chest with his fist, releasing a long, loud, deep, boyish, powerful, satisfyingly full burp. The boy feels the thick, warm air rush out of his mouth, knowing that's the last of his parents.
1242.title: His stomach growls

choices: belch some more and fall asleep
12422.content: As the boy's parent's digestes, he began to fill his stomach with anything edible, to satisfy his growing boy appetite. No food was safe. He devoured huge pile of junk food, as well as the leftovers in the fridge. Licking his fingers, the boy watched with a smirk as his bloated belly busily groaned, digesting it all. The boy let out a gigantic, deep burp, as his shirt rode up on him, revealing his smooth, pale skin and his large innie belly button. He felt awesome, stuffed to the max with food and proudly unleashing massive belches. He stomped his huge size 9 feet around the house, smelling the foods that were all digested as their scents carried on his burps.
12422.title: eat all the food in the house

info.description: All kids in the world are the only who remain big, all others shrink and became smallest. The kids have fun, vore, torture ecc, can have their revenge...hide if you don't want to finish in one little stomach...
